link.authorize.message: Authorize XSplit to use Facebook Live

subtitle2.authorize.error.message: Please try authorizing again and grant access to all permission required by XSplit for this functionality

help.post.text.message: Allowed URLs are public posts, your own posts (videos, images, etc) in your timeline, or posts of images and videos of a page you manage.

subtitle2.connect.error.message: Please provide a valid video or post URL.

help.lock.text.message: Checking this option will disable mouse hover, repositioning and resizing of the components.[br]Check this if you don't want to display hover effects on the components, especially while streaming or recording.
